    • 方法详细资料

      • getCardLayoutId

        protected int getCardLayoutId()
        从类复制的说明: RecyclableCard
        Get the R.layout ID of the root element of the content of the card. This value will be used to inflate the card and check whether an old card's View can be recycled.
        指定者:
        getCardLayoutId 在类中 RecyclableCard
        返回:
        layout ID of the card content

      • applyTo

        protected void applyTo(android.view.View convertView)
        从类复制的说明: RecyclableCard
        Set the values of child views. The view will not be null and is guaranteed to have the layout of the root element equal to the layout resource ID from getCardLayoutId().
        指定者:
        applyTo 在类中 RecyclableCard
        参数:
        convertView - non-null view to modify

      • setOverflowClickListener

        public void setOverflowClickListener(android.view.View.OnClickListener mOverflowClickListener)

      • OnSwipeCard

        public void OnSwipeCard()
        覆盖:
        OnSwipeCard 在类中 Card
